attributes.action: Stop Tony Robinson and the Time Team from digging up our ancestors for the purpose of making television programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our ancestors should be treated with dignity and respect. Perhaps we should dig up some of his dead relatives on TV and see how he likes it!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
